NETLI_MULTIROUTEONUDPON_RADIO.message: Give me the best media experience: This option allows Chrome to explore all network paths to find the best way to send and receive media, which may be different from normal web traffic.

NETLI_MULTIROUTEOFFUDPON_RADIO.message: Use only my default IP address: This option forces Chrome to use the same network path for media as for normal web traffic, except when a web proxy is present. To prevent degraded performance, Chrome will attempt to send media directly instead of using the proxy.

NETLI_MULTIROUTEOFFUDPOFF_RADIO.message: Use my proxy server (if present): This option forces Chrome to use the same network path for media as for normal web traffic, including use of a web proxy. Chrome will always attempt to send media through the proxy, which will typically hurt media performance and increase the load on the proxy; furthermore, this behavior may be incompatible with some applications.

NETLI_MULTIROUTEOFFUDPOFF_NOT_SUPPORTED_.message: This option is not available before Chrome version 47.

NETLI_APPDESC.message: Configures how WebRTC's network traffic is routed by changing Chrome's privacy settings.
